minecraft:scatter_feature.iterations: variable.s.size = 5; variable.s.step = 5; variable.s.threshold = 2; variable.s.step_size = (variable.s.size / variable.s.step); variable.s.base = query.heightmap(variable.originx, variable.originz); variable.s.x = 0; loop(variable.s.step, { variable.s.z = 0; loop(variable.s.step, { variable.s.h = query.heightmap(variable.originx + variable.s.x - (variable.s.size / 2), variable.originz + variable.s.z - (variable.s.size / 2)); math.abs(variable.s.base - variable.s.h) > variable.s.threshold ? { return 0; }; variable.s.z = variable.s.z + variable.s.step_size; }); variable.s.x = variable.s.x + variable.s.step_size; }); return 1;
